flashcards.back: a function that does not change any objects or variables that existed before it was called and secondly, it should always return the same result
is a function that changes any objects or variables that existed before rendering and returns an unpredictable result.
is a method or tool gives us a way to share global data across components, especially components in deeply nested hierarchies
to decide which component to create our state variable in, we need to locate the closest common parent.
information that every parent component can pass to its child components by passing any JavaScript value through them, including objects, arrays, and functions.
